name: Command Ops 2
description: Command Ops 2 is a wargame engine that lets you assess, plan, order and react at the operational level just like a real Corps, Division and Brigade commander. What sets Command Ops 2 apart from the competition is the most advanced and realistic model of command decision-making.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 64 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: 16 bit Additional Notes: Display Resolution: Variable. Min 1366 x 768
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 3 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 2048 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: 16 Bit Additional Notes: Display Resolution: Max 2560 x 1600. Optimised for 1920 x 1080. Game must run with 100% (96dpi) screen resolution.
